title.bibl: Der Westen (Sunday Edition of Illinois Staats-Zeitung) Jan. 26, 1879. The Chicago Mining and Milling Company What the English Press Says of A. C. Hesing's Enterprise

div.bibl: Der Westen (Sunday Edition of Illinois Staats-Zeitung) Jan. 26, 1879. THE CHICAGO MINING AND MILLING COMPANY What the English Press Says of A. C. Hesing's Enterprise

body.p: [Translator's note: Since the above papers are printed in English, no translation is given. The Chicago Mining and Milling Company, incorporated under the laws of Illinois, is a Chicago concern, founded by A. C. Hesing. The obejct of the company is to erect an ore crusher in a promising district of Arizona.]
